home.shortDescription: Experienced Software Engineer with over a decade in banking, insurance, and public sectors. Passionate about building reliable solutions and improving user experience.

exampleA.title: DevOps & CI/CD
exampleA.description: I design and implement end-to-end CI/CD pipelines from scratch, focusing on <highlight>reliability, fast feedback, and predictable deployments</highlight>. My goal is to remove manual steps and make delivery simple and repeatable

items.quality_gates: Quality gates: tests, linting, security checks
